about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm a software engineer who enjoys building useful things and figuring stuff out. Most of my experience is in internal tools ‚Äî React, Java, and AWS ‚Äî working across the stack. I'm happiest on projects where I can understand the problem, not just implement a spec.

jobs.description: Building scalable web applications and leading frontend architecture decisions. Working with modern technologies to deliver exceptional user experiences.
Data handling for embedded ML model at NXP and Android testing tool development at Vivo.
